titleStmt.title: The first booke of questions and answers vpon Genesis Containing those questions that are most eminent and pertinent, vpon the sixe first chapters of the same booke: collected out of ancient and recent writers; both briefly and subtilly propounded and expounded, by Alexander Rosse, of Aberdine, preacher at Saint Maries neere Southampton, and one of his Maiesites chaplaines.
titleStmt.author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.

titleStmt.title: The first booke of questions and answers vpon Genesis Containing those questions that are most eminent and pertinent, vpon the sixe first chapters of the same booke: collected out of ancient and recent writers; both briefly and subtilly propounded and expounded, by Alexander Rosse, of Aberdine, preacher at Saint Maries neere Southampton, and one of his Maiesites chaplaines.
titleStmt.author: Ross, Alexander, 1591-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Francis Constable, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, ouer-against the great North doore, at the signe of the white Lyon,

notesStmt.note: Includes frontispiece, opposite A1, title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
